mapper.select: /* productsMapper.getProducts */ SELECT P.PROD_ID ,P.PROD_NM ,P.PRNT_PROD_ID ,P.COMP_ID ,P.PROD_SKIN ,P.PROD_MOBI_SKIN ,P.PROD_MFR ,P.PROD_ORIGIN ,P.PROD_BRAND ,P.PROD_MODEL ,P.PROD_AMT ,P.PROD_INV_QTY ,P.PROD_USE_QTY ,P.PROD_IN_QTY ,P.SOLD_OUT_YN ,P.POINT_ID ,P.CPN_ID ,P.PROD_WEIGHT ,P.PROD_INCL_QTY ,P.DELIV_FEE_TYP_CD ,P.BASE_DELIV_FEE ,P.DELIV_FREE_MIN_AMT ,P.DELIV_BASE_WEIGHT ,P.DELIV_BASE_QTY ,P.PROD_VIEWS ,PROD_REG_DTM ,PROD_UPD_DTM ,P.REG_IP ,P.SORT_SEQ ,P.SALES_QTY ,P.INC_SMS_NOTIF_YN ,P.REVIEW_NUM ,P.REVIEW_RTG_AVG ,P.USE_YN ,P.REG_USER_ID ,REG_DTM ,P.UPD_USER_ID ,UPD_DTM FROM CW_PRODUCTS P WHERE P.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
mapper.update:
/* productsMapper.updateProducts */ UPDATE CW_PRODUCTS
PROD_NM = #{prodNm},
PRNT_PROD_ID = #{prntProdId},
COMP_ID = #{compId},
PROD_SKIN = #{prodSkin},
PROD_MOBI_SKIN = #{prodMobiSkin},
PROD_MFR = #{prodMfr},
PROD_ORIGIN = #{prodOrigin},
PROD_BRAND = #{prodBrand},
PROD_MODEL = #{prodModel},
PROD_AMT = #{prodAmt},
PROD_INV_QTY = #{prodInvQty},
PROD_USE_QTY = #{prodUseQty},
PROD_IN_QTY = #{prodInQty},
SOLD_OUT_YN = #{soldOutYn},
POINT_ID = #{pointId},
CPN_ID = #{cpnId},
PROD_WEIGHT = #{prodWeight},
PROD_INCL_QTY = #{prodInclQty},
DELIV_FEE_TYP_CD = #{delivFeeTypCd},
BASE_DELIV_FEE = #{baseDelivFee},
DELIV_FREE_MIN_AMT = #{delivFreeMinAmt},
DELIV_BASE_WEIGHT = #{delivBaseWeight},
DELIV_BASE_QTY = #{delivBaseQty},
PROD_VIEWS = #{prodViews},
PROD_REG_DTM = STR_TO_DATE(#{prodRegDtm}, '%Y%m%d %h%i%s'),
PROD_UPD_DTM = STR_TO_DATE(#{prodUpdDtm}, '%Y%m%d %h%i%s'),
REG_IP = #{regIp},
SORT_SEQ = #{sortSeq},
SALES_QTY = #{salesQty},
INC_SMS_NOTIF_YN = #{incSmsNotifYn},
REVIEW_NUM = #{reviewNum},
REVIEW_RTG_AVG = #{reviewRtgAvg},
USE_YN = #{useYn},
UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId},
UPD_DTM = NOW(),
WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
